content:

TimonPost commented on issue #6566:

@jameysharp the pr description says: "When this PR is merged a release tag will automatically be
created, crates will be published, and CI artifacts will be produced.". I don't see a release of wasmtime 0.9.4 on crates io and also RELEASES.md is not updated?

TimonPost edited a comment on issue #6566:

@jameysharp the pr description says: "When this PR is merged a release tag will automatically be
created, crates will be published, and CI artifacts will be produced.". I don't see a release of wasmtime 0.9.4 on crates io. Did the CI fail here like @alexcrichton commented on?

alexcrichton commented on issue #6566:

Ah there's a bit of discussion on Zulip about this but CI was having issues yesterday which caused CI on the merge to fail

jameysharp commented on issue #6566:

Thanks to Alex pointing me in the right direction, 9.0.4 is on crates.io now!
